about_the_game:
Fishing is not a hobby, it's a mindset. It is only reserved for the most dedicated among us. The extensive knowledge and experience required to be a full-time fisherman weeds out the weak and discourages even the strong. This job is not an easy one, but if you think you are up to it then... Who is stopping you?

Hop on the Fishing Grind.

Fishing Grind is a Coop/Singleplayer experience where you and up to five friends can fish in the various environments of the North American wilderness. Most of the locations you visit are relatively safe, but some places have threats. Bears, sharks, and even other humans that will test the limits of your strength. How far will you go to get just one more catch?

GAMEPLAY

Partake in riveting and innovative fishing gameplay. Start your journey with almost nothing and steadily build up your collection of rods, lures, and hooks! Realism can be fun in some games, but when working on Fishing Grind our team found that a less "realistic" approach turned out to be more fun. This creative choice also allowed for us to simplify some mechanics; these decisions will hopefully make the game easier to pick up for new players while still keeping veteran players invested!

CO-OP

Fishing by yourself can get pretty lonely, so Fishing Grind supports six player lobbies!

What are you waiting for? Download Fishing Grind and start playing!

DISCORD

Join our Discord server to get involved with the community, report bugs, and request features!

content_descriptors.notes: Murder, gore, violence, blood, depictions of suicide, and sometimes graphic death animations.

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K @ 4.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
